title: [release/vs17.6] Onboard 1es templates (#9924)
body:
### Context
Apply 1es templates and update arcade for the servicing branch.

Port https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/commit/f0e7eb22b63f5b163094974951546c6dd002fe14

### Test run

https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=9455778&view=results

nodes.body: I'd expect this to change too.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,23 +1,23 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <Dependencies>
   <ToolsetDependencies>
-    <Dependency Name="Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk" Version="6.0.0-beta.23313.5">

     </Dependency>
